edu.umuc.swen.domain

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umuc.swen.domain.Course
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HybridCourse, LabCourse, OnlineCourse

    public abstract class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    Domain class modeling a course
    Author:
    ezerbo

      • parseStudents

        protected java.util.List<Student> parseStudents(java.lang.String students)
        Parses student records, separated by new lines, from a string. It returns an empty list when no student records are found Otherwise, it splits the string passed as parameter and for each student record, it creates an instance of Student. It then collects all the records into a list and returns it.
        Parameters:
        students - String to parse student records from
        Returns:
        students A list of students

      • parseGradebook

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> parseGradebook(java.lang.String gradebook)
        Parses gradebook records, separated by new lines, from a string
        Parameters:
        gradebook - string to parse gradebook records from
        Returns:
        gradebook The Gradebook

      • formatStudentRecords

        private java.lang.String formatStudentRecords()
        Formats the student records. Call toString on each student record, concatenate it with a new line, collect the result into a list and return it.
        Returns:
        The formated student records
